cause.description:
We are dedicated volunteers supporting PUFFY with our time and talents. We are passionate about creating opportunities for youth as well as our love for ultimate frisbee.
1. Ultimate is an excellent sport for youth.
2. Ultimate teaches life lessons beyond that of 'typical' youth sports.
3. Supporting youth ultimate is critical in fostering the local ultimate communities at all levels.
cause.mission: increase the opportunities for youth to play Ultimate Frisbee!
cause.name: PDX Youth Ultimate
